#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
char a[100000];
int flag=0;
scanf("%s",&a);
int m=strlen(a);
char b[m];
long long int i=0;
while(a[i]!='\0'){
 if(a[i]=='1')
    b[i]='1';
else if(a[i]=='6')
    b[i]='9';
else if(a[i]=='8')
    b[i]='8';
else if(a[i]=='9')
  b[i]='6';
else if(a[i]=='0')
    b[i]='0';
else
{
flag=1;
break;
}

i++;}
i--;
if(flag==0)
{cout<<"YES"<<endl;
while(i>=0)
{
cout<<b[i];
i--;
}
cout<<endl;
}
else
cout<<"NO"<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
